levelSidesToTest.case: Should render all level items on left side
Should render all level items on center side
Should render all level items on right side

parameters.componentSubtitle: A multi-purpose horizontal level, which can contain almost any other element

description.component: The structure of a level is the following: `level` for the main container, `level-left` for the left side, `level-right` for the right side and `level-item` for each individual element.
